mean_cn: v.使协调，使一致，调整；  n.坐标；  adj.并列的
mean_en: to organize the different parts of an activity and the people involved in it so that it works well
sentence: The dancers coordinated their moves so they could deliver a wonderful performance.
sentence_trans: 舞者们动作协调一致，呈现出精彩的表演。
word_etyma: co共同 + ordin顺序 + ate动词后缀 → 顺序相同 → coordinate协调，同等的
